languages.text: {n}Когда Арджента, наконец, открывает глаза, в них пылает странная решимость.{/n} "Вольный Торговец, нам надо поговорить. Вернее... мне надо кое-что рассказать. Правду. Правду о том, как я оказалась на корабле Теодоры фон Валанциус, и кем были те культисты, с кем мы сцепились на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфоле{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Когда Арджента, наконец, открывает глаза, в них пылает странная решимость.{/n} "Вольный Торговец, нам надо поговорить. Вернее... мне надо кое-что рассказать. Правду. Правду о том, как я оказалась на корабле Теодоры фон Валанциус, и кем были те культисты, с кем мы сцепились на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфоле{/g}".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}When Argenta finally opens her eyes, they are alight with uncanny resolution.{/n} "Rogue Trader, we need to talk. Or rather... I need to tell you something. The truth. The truth about how I ended up on Theodora von Valancius's ship and about the cultists we encountered on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}Когда Арджента, наконец, открывает глаза, в них пылает странная решимость.{/n} "Вольный Торговец, нам надо поговорить. Вернее... мне надо кое-что рассказать. Правду. Правду о том, как я оказалась на корабле Теодоры фон Валанциус, и кем были те культисты, с кем мы сцепились на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфоле{/g}".

The truth about how I ended up on Theodora von Valancius's ship and who were those cultists we encountered on Footfall."

The truth about how I ended up on Theodora von Valancius's ship and about the cultists we encountered on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}当阿洁塔终于睁开双眼时，她的眼神中闪耀着几近诡谲的决心。{/n}“行商浪人，我们需要谈谈。或者说……我需要告诉你某些事情，某些真相。关于我是怎么上了西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的船，还有我们在{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}遇到的那群邪教徒是怎么回事。”
languages.original_text: {n}When Argenta finally opens her eyes, they are alight with uncanny resolution.{/n} "Rogue Trader, we need to talk. Or rather... I need to tell you something. The truth. The truth about how I ended up on Theodora von Valancius's ship and about the cultists we encountered on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}当阿洁塔终于睁开双眼时，她的眼神中闪耀着几近诡谲的决心。{/n}“行商浪人，我们需要谈谈。或者说……我需要告诉你某些事情，某些真相。关于我是怎么上了西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的船，还有我们在{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}遇到的那群邪教徒是怎么回事。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cuando Argenta por fin abre los ojos, en su interior arde una determinación sobrenatural.{/n} «Comerciante Independiente, tenemos que hablar. Bueno... Soy yo la que tiene algo que contarle: la verdad sobre cómo acabé en la nave de Theodora von Valancius y sobre los sectarios que encontramos en {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}When Argenta finally opens her eyes, they are alight with uncanny resolution.{/n} "Rogue Trader, we need to talk. Or rather... I need to tell you something. The truth. The truth about how I ended up on Theodora von Valancius's ship and about the cultists we encountered on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando Argenta por fin abre los ojos, en su interior arde una determinación sobrenatural.{/n} «Comerciante Independiente, tenemos que hablar. Bueno... Soy yo la que tiene algo que contarle: la verdad sobre cómo acabé en la nave de Theodora von Valancius y sobre los sectarios que encontramos en {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタがようやく目を開けたとき、その目は不気味なほどに輝いていた。{/n}「自由開拓者よ、話があります。というよりも…話したいことがあるのです。真実を。シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの船に乗ることになった経緯と、{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}で遭遇した教団について」
languages.original_text: {n}When Argenta finally opens her eyes, they are alight with uncanny resolution.{/n} "Rogue Trader, we need to talk. Or rather... I need to tell you something. The truth. The truth about how I ended up on Theodora von Valancius's ship and about the cultists we encountered on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタがようやく目を開けたとき、その目は不気味なほどに輝いていた。{/n}「自由開拓者よ、話があります。というよりも…話したいことがあるのです。真実を。シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスの船に乗ることになった経緯と、{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}で遭遇した教団について」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Als Argenta die Augen schließlich öffnet, leuchtet in ihnen eine fast unheimliche Entschlossenheit.{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, wir müssen reden. Oder besser ... ich muss Euch etwas erzählen. Die Wahrheit. Die Wahrheit darüber, wie ich auf das Schiff von Theodora von Valancius kam und über die Kultisten, denen wir auf {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} begegnet sind."
languages.original_text: {n}When Argenta finally opens her eyes, they are alight with uncanny resolution.{/n} "Rogue Trader, we need to talk. Or rather... I need to tell you something. The truth. The truth about how I ended up on Theodora von Valancius's ship and about the cultists we encountered on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Als Argenta die Augen schließlich öffnet, leuchtet in ihnen eine fast unheimliche Entschlossenheit.{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, wir müssen reden. Oder besser ... ich muss Euch etwas erzählen. Die Wahrheit. Die Wahrheit darüber, wie ich auf das Schiff von Theodora von Valancius kam und über die Kultisten, denen wir auf {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} begegnet sind."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Lorsqu'Argenta ouvre enfin les yeux, une mystérieuse lueur de résolution y brille.{/n} « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, nous devons discuter. Ou plutôt... je dois vous dire quelque chose. La vérité, sur les circonstances de ma rencontre avec Théodora von Valancius et sur les cultistes que nous avons trouvés à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}When Argenta finally opens her eyes, they are alight with uncanny resolution.{/n} "Rogue Trader, we need to talk. Or rather... I need to tell you something. The truth. The truth about how I ended up on Theodora von Valancius's ship and about the cultists we encountered on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsqu'Argenta ouvre enfin les yeux, une mystérieuse lueur de résolution y brille.{/n} « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, nous devons discuter. Ou plutôt... je dois vous dire quelque chose. La vérité, sur les circonstances de ma rencontre avec Théodora von Valancius et sur les cultistes que nous avons trouvés à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}En sonunda gözlerini açan Argenta'nın sarsılmaz kararlılığı, çakmak çakmak gözlerine yansıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir, konuşmamız gerekiyor. Daha doğrusu... Sana bir şey söylemem gerekiyor. Hakikati söyleyeceğim. Theodora von Valancius'un gemisine binişim ve {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman'da{/g} karşılaştığımız tarikatçılar hakkındaki hakikati."
languages.original_text: {n}When Argenta finally opens her eyes, they are alight with uncanny resolution.{/n} "Rogue Trader, we need to talk. Or rather... I need to tell you something. The truth. The truth about how I ended up on Theodora von Valancius's ship and about the cultists we encountered on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}En sonunda gözlerini açan Argenta'nın sarsılmaz kararlılığı, çakmak çakmak gözlerine yansıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir, konuşmamız gerekiyor. Daha doğrusu… Sana bir şey söylemem gerekiyor. Hakikati söyleyeceğim. Theodora von Valancius'un gemisine binişim ve {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g}'da karşılaştığımız tarikatçılar hakkındaki hakikati."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
